mapper.select: SELECT lo.application_no, lo.loan_application_no, lo.model, sum(lo.principal) principal, sum(lo.service_fee) serviceFee, sum(lo.xxt_fee) xxtFee, sum(lo.geex_fee) geexFee, sum(lo.guarantee_fee) guaranteeFee, sum(lo.other_fee) otherFee, lo.cooperation_code, lo.cooperation_name, lo.`project_code`, ap.`name` projectName, lo.product_code, lo.product_name FROM amp_capital.`loan_order` lo join amp_order.amp_project ap on lo.project_code = ap.no WHERE lo.`payment_time` >= #{startTime} AND lo.`payment_time` < #{endTime} and lo.is_delete = 0 and lo.is_cancel = 0 group by lo.cooperation_code, lo.model, lo.product_code

SELECT lo.`cooperation_code`, lo.`cooperation_name`, lo.`project_code`, SUM(lp.`payment_amt`) paymentAmount, SUM(lp.`realpayment_amt`) realPaymentAmount, lp.`acc_type`, ob.`channel_id` channel, sum(lp.`realpayment_amt` - lp.`payment_amt`) fee FROM amp_capital.loan_payment lp JOIN amp_capital.`loan_order` lo ON lp.`loan_application_no` = lo.`loan_application_no` JOIN amp_payment.`order_business` ob ON lp.`pay_apply_no` = ob.`biz_serial_no` WHERE lo.`model` != 2 and lp.is_delete = 0 and lo.is_cancel = 0 AND lo.`payment_time` >= #{startTime} AND lo.`payment_time` < #{endTime} GROUP BY lo.cooperation_code, lp.`acc_type`, ob.`channel_id`
